Description: Curiosity cabinet; view of the room in which the collection of Ferdinando Cospi was displayed in Bologna; along the walls are glass show-cases containing numerous natural and man-made objects, and above the cases is a bust of Dante, weapons and stuffed animals hung from the ceiling; two men point to items in the cases. 1667 Etching
Producer name: Print made by: Giuseppe Maria Mitelli
Curator's comments: Plate from 'Museo Cospiano annesso a quello del famoso Ulisse Aldrovandi e donato alla sua patria dall'Ill. Sig. Ferdinando Cospi ... descrizione di Lorenzo Legati, Cremonese', Bologna (Giacomo Monti) 1667
Bibliographic references: Bertarelli 1940 / Le Incisioni di Giuseppe Maria Mitelli, catalogo critico (301)
Exhibition history: 2022- 2023 13 Oct - 19 Feb, London, BM, G30, Hieroglyphs: Unlocking Ancient Egypt
